titleStmt.title: The Proceedings to sentence of death against Algernon Sidny, Esq, who was convicted of high-treason, (on the 21 of November 1683) at the Kings-bench-bar, for conspiring the death of the King, to subvert the government, &c. being an account of what remarkably passed on that occasion.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
